txt.en: Caras Gelebren, the Silver Bastion, was once the capital of Tham Mírdain and the jewel of Eregion. Alas, it was brought to ruin long ago when Sauron, seeking to lay claim to the Rings of Power, gathered his vast armies and destroyed all of Eregion.

Caras Gelebren, the Silver Bastion, was once the capital of Tham Mírdain and the jewel of Eregion. Alas, it was brought to ruin long ago when Sauron, seeking to lay claim to the Rings of Power, gathered his vast armies and destroyed all of Eregion.
You and your allies stood defiantly against the forces of the Enemy at Caras Gelebren. Although victory could not be won, you held fast against the armies of Sauron.
